constellations_other.name: Iconic creative partnerships (animal print coat placeholder)
constellations_other.description: Actor Nicholas Hoult and writer-director Tony Mcnamara worked on The Favourite (2019) together before Hoult was cast in The Great. Strong creative partnerships between particular actors and directors are the backbone of screen creativity.
